name: part_008
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs the song 'DEAD OR ALIVE'.
IRyS talks to the audience (MC section) about the song and the anime 'Fafner in the Azure', then transitions to announcements.
A graphic showing IRyS's 2024 Birthday Celebration merchandise.

subtitles.original: 痛い 痛い
subtitles.english: It hurts, it hurts

subtitles.original: 砕け散って
subtitles.english: Shatter into pieces

subtitles.original: くらい くらい くらい
subtitles.english: Dark, dark, dark

subtitles.original: 君とソライロ
subtitles.english: With you and the sky color

subtitles.original: And that was DEAD OR ALIVE!
subtitles.english: And that was DEAD OR ALIVE!

subtitles.original: Yes, another beautiful song from the Fafner series.
subtitles.english: Yes, another beautiful song from the Fafner series.

subtitles.original: Since I sang Shangri-La for my 3D showcase,
subtitles.english: Since I sang Shangri-La for my 3D showcase,

subtitles.original: I wanted to sing another Fafner song, so I chose DEAD OR ALIVE.
subtitles.english: I wanted to sing another Fafner song, so I chose DEAD OR ALIVE.

subtitles.original: How did you guys like that?
subtitles.english: How did you guys like that?

subtitles.original: ファフナーのね、あのDEAD OR ALIVE歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: I sang Fafner's "DEAD OR ALIVE."

subtitles.original: 前回のね、あの3Dのお披露目配信ではシャングリラ歌ったので、
subtitles.english: In the previous 3D debut stream, I sang "Shangri-La,"

subtitles.original: それに続けて今回はDEAD OR ALIVE歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: so following that, I sang "DEAD OR ALIVE" this time.

subtitles.original: ファフナー最高なんで、もし見てない方いましたら、見てください。
subtitles.english: Fafner is the best, so if you haven't seen it, please watch it.

subtitles.original: If you haven't watched Fafner yet, I highly recommend you do,
subtitles.english: If you haven't watched Fafner yet, I highly recommend you do,

subtitles.original: 'cause the songs are amazing and the anime itself is great. Yes.
subtitles.english: 'cause the songs are amazing and the anime itself is great. Yes.

subtitles.original: Ah, and now that we've sung DEAD OR ALIVE,
subtitles.english: Ah, and now that we've sung DEAD OR ALIVE,

subtitles.original: I think we are past the halfway line of this live.
subtitles.english: I think we are past the halfway line of this live.

subtitles.original: And now that since that's the case,
subtitles.english: And now that since that's the case,

subtitles.original: I think it's about time we announce something big,
subtitles.english: I think it's about time we announce something big,

subtitles.original: something that I think a lot of you guys were completely expecting
subtitles.english: something that I think a lot of you guys were completely expecting

subtitles.original: because it's, you know, it's the usual stuff.
subtitles.english: because it's, you know, it's the usual stuff.

subtitles.original: では、えーと、告知タイムに行きましょうか。
subtitles.english: Well, shall we move on to the announcement time?

subtitles.original: みんながおそらく期待していたというか、まあいつものね、告知させていただきます。
subtitles.english: I'll make the announcement that everyone was probably expecting, or rather, the usual one.

subtitles.original: では、ドン！
subtitles.english: Here it is!

subtitles.original: IRyS Birthday Celebration 2024
subtitles.english: IRyS Birthday Celebration 2024
